title: Determining the userid
content:
From SmartWiki
(Redirected from 
Userid
)
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
In order to determine the userid:
 * Right-click on any hyperlink to the relevant user/contact profile and select Properties.
Within the address displayed it will list the userid for that user/contact.
